by.horant.fintask.dao

Interface UpdateUserDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SQLUpdateUserDao

    public interface UpdateUserDao
    The user of this interface undertakes to implement the functionality of updating user data in the database. This includes updating your password, email, and personal information (for example, first and last name).
    Author:
    Anton Horbach

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean updateEmail(java.lang.String newEmail, java.lang.String oldEmail)
      Updates user email.
      boolean updatePassword(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      Updates user password.
      boolean updateProfile(java.lang.String email, UpdateProfileData updateData)
      Updates user profile(for example, first and second name).

    • Method Detail

      • updateProfile

        boolean updateProfile(java.lang.String email,
                      UpdateProfileData updateData)
               throws DaoException
        Updates user profile(for example, first and second name).
        Parameters:
        email - email user whose data we want to update.
        updateData - an object of class UpdateProfileData which encapsulates the necessary data for updating.
        Returns:
        true - if the update was successful, false - if the update wasn't successful.
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • updatePassword

        boolean updatePassword(java.lang.String email,
                       java.lang.String password)
                throws DaoException
        Updates user password.
        Parameters:
        email - email user whose data we want to update.
        password - new user password.
        Returns:
        true - if the update was successful, false - if the update wasn't successful.
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • updateEmail

        boolean updateEmail(java.lang.String newEmail,
                    java.lang.String oldEmail)
             throws DaoException
        Updates user email.
        Parameters:
        newEmail - new email user whose data we want to update.
        oldEmail - old email user whose data we want to update.
        Returns:
        true - if the update was successful, false - if the update wasn't successful.
        Throws:
        DaoException
